Hero.HeroDescription: A modern, open-source template for building SaaS applications with Next.js 15, Cloudflare Workers, and everything you need to launch quickly.

Features.SectionTitle: Everything you need to build a SaaS
Features.SectionDescription: Start with a complete foundation. All the essential features are built-in, so you can focus on what makes your SaaS unique.

AuthenticationReady.name: Authentication Ready
AuthenticationReady.description: Complete authentication system with email/password sign in, sign up, forgot password flow, and session management using Lucia Auth.

DatabaseEmail.name: Database & Email
DatabaseEmail.description: Drizzle ORM with Cloudflare D1 for the database, and React Email with Resend for beautiful email templates.

ModernStack.name: Modern Stack
ModernStack.description: Next.js 15 App Router with React Server Components, Server Actions, and Edge Runtime for optimal performance.

BeautifulUI.name: Beautiful UI
BeautifulUI.description: Polished UI with Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI components, dark/light mode, and responsive design out of the box.

EdgeDeployment.name: Edge Deployment
EdgeDeployment.description: Deploy globally with Cloudflare Workers for zero cold starts and leverage Cloudflare's edge network for blazing-fast performance.

DeveloperExperience.name: Developer Experience
DeveloperExperience.description: GitHub Actions for deployment, comprehensive documentation, and TypeScript for type safety.

FormHandling.name: Form Handling
FormHandling.description: Built-in form validation with Zod and React Hook Form for a smooth user experience.

TeamReady.name: Team Ready
TeamReady.description: Built with collaboration in mind. Easy to customize and extend with your team's requirements.

FAQ.Answer1: Yes, this template is completely free and open source! You can use it for both personal and commercial projects without any licensing fees. You can fork, copy, modify, and distribute it as you see fit without any restrictions and attribution.
FAQ.Answer2: The template includes a comprehensive set of features:

Features.Authentication: Authentication with email/password and forgot password flow
Features.Database: Database integration with Drizzle ORM and Cloudflare D1
Features.Email: Email service powered by React Email and Resend
Features.UI: Modern UI components from Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS

FAQ.Answer3: The template uses modern and reliable technologies:

TechStack.NextJS: Next.js 15 with App Router and React Server Components
TechStack.Styling: Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI for styling
TechStack.Database: DrizzleORM with Cloudflare D1 for database
TechStack.Email: React Email for beautiful email templates

FAQ.Question4: How do I deploy my application?
FAQ.Answer4: Deployment is automated with GitHub Actions. You'll need to:

DeploymentSteps.Step1: Create Cloudflare D1 and KV namespaces
DeploymentSteps.Step2: Set up Resend for email service
DeploymentSteps.Step4: Add your Cloudflare API token to GitHub secrets

FAQ.DeploymentNote: The deployment process is fully documented in the GitHub repository.
FAQ.Question5: What do I need to get started?
FAQ.Answer5: You'll need a Cloudflare account (free tier is fine), Node.js installed locally, and basic knowledge of React and TypeScript. The template includes detailed documentation to guide you through the setup.
FAQ.Answer5Note: You can also check out the documentation for more information.
FAQ.Answer6: We have an exciting roadmap ahead! Planned features include:
FAQ.Question7: Can I preview the email templates?
FAQ.Answer7: Yes! Run pnpm email:dev and open http://localhost:3001 to preview and edit the email templates. They're built with React Email for a great developer experience.
FAQ.Question8: How do I customize the template?
FAQ.Answer8: Before deploying to production, you should:

CustomizationSteps.Colors: Optionally update the color palette in src/app/globals.css

FAQ.Answer9: Contributions are welcome! Feel free to open issues, submit pull requests, or help improve the documentation on GitHub. The project follows standard open source contribution guidelines.

Privacy.Title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.Description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data
Privacy.Section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including but not limited to your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
Privacy.Section2Content: We use the information we collect to:
Section2List: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Privacy.Section3Content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
Privacy.Section4Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Terms.Section4Content2: Once a payment is successfully processed, credits will be immediately added to your account. We do not offer refunds for purchased credits. The price and availability of credit packages may change without prior notice.
Terms.Section4Content3: Free credits may be provided as part of promotional offers or monthly allocations. These credits are subject to different terms and expiration periods, which will be clearly communicated at the time they are issued.
Terms.Section5Content: In no event shall we or our suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website.
